text: Maria Antoinette "Mies" Bouwman (31 December 1929 - 26 February 2018) was a retired Dutch television presenter. She was born in Amsterdam. She started her career on the very first broadcasting evening of the Dutch broadcasting association KRO (Catholic Radio Broadcaster) on 16 October 1951. Bouwman developed and hosted EÃ©n van de acht. It was known in the UK as The Generation Game. She hosted many talk shows, as well as the Dutch version of This Is Your Life.Birth of Television website on Open het Dorp, viewed 25 June 2010. She stopped her regular work after falling sick but has occasionally returned for special programs. Bouwman died on 26 February 2018 in Elst, Netherlands of cardiomyopathy at the age of 88.Mies Bouwman (88) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiomyopathy Category:Dutch television presenters Category:People from Amsterdam
title: Mies Bouwman
